["Commodity type: Matte long straight hair wig Style: Women's long straight wig Wig type: Headband wig Color: Black gradient light brown on the top of the head Material: Heat-resistant synthetic fiber. ProductPackage: 1 wig + 1 free hair cap + 1 free hair band Version: V2 (add 4 comb inside to increase safety) How to wear a wig: 1. Wrap your hair tightly in the wig cap we prepared for you. 2. Push in all the hair on the sides, back and front to create a smooth surface. 3. Gently comb the wig and pull the adjustable strap to fit your head size. 4. Hold the top and bottom of the wig, pull it out from the front of the head, and then gently pull it back to adjust the wig to cover the hat and fit the head perfectly How to clean a wig: 1. Using mild shampoo, gently soak the wig in cold or warm water. 2. Rinse the hair in the same direction with warm water. 3. Gently comb your hair from top to bottom. 4. Tile the wig and let it dry naturally. How to care for a wig: 1. Do not spray gel water and wax on the wig to avoid greasy wigs. 2. Do not use hair clips to avoid damage to the net. 3. Do not curl hair that exceeds 400 degrees Fahrenheit (about 100.2 degrees Celsius). Comb your hair patiently. 4. After finishing use, put it back in the box or dust-proof. Q A 1. Why does hair fall out? After the new product is produced, some floating hair will appear on it. When wearing it for the first time, please comb and remove the floating hair. 2. About tangles: Hair will be tangled due to dryness, grease and dirt accumulation. And all synthetic wigs are a little tangled, which is normal.For long-term use, please make sure to wash and care for it at least once a week. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user continues to emphasize hair care products suitable for curly, coily, and damaged hair, while also exploring synthetic braiding extensions and wigs. Their recent experiences, including challenges with overly thick wigs and a disappointing heat-resistant fiber option, have reinforced their desire for lighter, more manageable styles. However, their latest purchase of crochet hair extensions has received high praise, reflecting a successful choice that resonates with their aesthetic direction.

Despite previous setbacks, the user's commitment to quality endures, highlighting their discerning nature when evaluating hair accessories. They prioritize a natural appearance, versatility, and comfort, showcasing a thoughtful balance between aesthetics and functionality in their hair care journey.

Recent interactions indicate a willingness to reassess brand loyalty while refining their choices within the hair care landscape. As their collection grows, the user is focusing on selecting high-quality items that meet both health and style standards. They remain open to new styles, consistently seeking products that align with their preferences without compromising comfort or functionality. This ongoing journey illustrates their dedication to curating a diverse yet cohesive assortment of hair care solutions tailored to their unique needs.
